hints.content: $40{,}833$ = $\redD{4 \text{ ten thousands}}$ + ${0 \text{ thousands}}$ + $\goldD{8 \text{ hundreds}}$ + $\purpleD{3\text{ tens}}$ + $\maroonD{3\text{ ones}}$

Now, let's fill in $\redD{40{,}000}+\goldD{800}+\purpleD{30}+\maroonD{3}$ on the place value chart.

Ten thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
 :-: | :-: | :-: |:-: |:-:
$\redD{4}$ | $0$ | $\goldD{8}$ | $\purpleD{3}$ | $\maroonD{3}$

Ten thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
 :-: | :-: | :-: |:-: |:-:
$4$ | $0$ | $8$ | $3$ | $3$
